title: Baseball Bat Store – Shopify Migration & Customization
overview: Baseball Bat Store, a premium baseball bat company, required a more robust e-commerce solution to handle their complex product customization options. The project involved migrating their entire store from WordPress to Shopify while enhancing their custom bat builder experience.
objective: Implement an advanced visual product customization interface.
Preserve customer data and improve the overall shopping experience.
Enhance user experience with intuitive product customization.
Improve backend efficiency for order processing.
challenges: Complex product customization options requiring multiple selection types (dropdowns, radio buttons, image swatches).
Need for real-time visual product preview with numerous color combinations.
Data migration issues, including initial order duplication.
Custom code requirements for conditional product options.
solution: Prioritized preserving the product customization experience while leveraging Shopify’s platform capabilities.
Integrated third-party apps such as Live Preview Options by Webyze for product visualization and Instafeed for Instagram integration.
Utilized Matrixify for WordPress data migration and Order Printer Pro for detailed order slips.
Created a comprehensive solution that addressed both front-end and back-end requirements.

implementation.heading: Data Mapping & Migration
points: Ensured proper translation of WordPress configurations to Shopify.
Handled complex product data, images, and order records.
Maintained integrity of customer accounts and historical orders.

implementation.heading: Custom Development
points: Developed custom Liquid templates for product option relationships.
Rebuilt conditional logic for dynamic product customization.
Streamlined backend logic for efficient order processing.

implementation.heading: UX & Product Page Redesign
points: Consistently positioned product options on the right side of product pages.
Displayed live product visualization prominently on the left.
Thoroughly tested all customization options and color combinations.

results: Fully functional visual product customization system on Shopify.
Streamlined administrative processes using Shopify’s built-in capabilities.
Successful transfer of customer data and order history.
Enhanced inventory management for custom bat components.
Improved checkout process with clear customization details.
